General.Name: Shanghai Huafon Aluminium Corp
General.Description: Shanghai Huafon Aluminium Corporation engages in the research and development, production, and sales of aluminum sheets, strips, and foils. Its products include aluminum heat transfer materials comprising composite and non-composite materials are used in the automobile and construction machinery; power stations and heat exchange systems for household and commercial air conditioners; battery materials, including rectangular/square battery shell materials, aluminum strips for bar batteries, battery foils, and soft packs aluminum foil; and stamping products. The company also provides radiator, air charge air cooler, water charge air cooler, oil cooler, parallel flow condenser, water condenser, parallel flow evaporator, stacked evaporator, and heater core; battery cooling plate, battery chiller, and low temperature radiator; honey comb plate and fin; and power plants. Shanghai Huafon Aluminium Corporation was founded in 2008 and is based in Shanghai, China.
